description: LinkHut manages bookmarked links in a minimalistic, shareable interface, helping teams organize URLs and track references in one place

capabilities.name: LINKHUT_ADD_BOOKMARK
capabilities.description: Adds a new bookmark to LinkHut. The bookmark can be marked as private/public and read/unread, with optional tags and notes.

capabilities.name: LINKHUT_DELETE_BOOKMARK
capabilities.description: This tool allows users to delete a bookmark from their Linkhut account by providing the bookmark URL. It operates independently and only requires the URL parameter to identify and remove the bookmark.

capabilities.name: LINKHUT_GET_ALL_TAGS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of all tags and their usage counts for the authenticated user. No additional parameters required besides authentication.

capabilities.name: LINKHUT_GET_BOOKMARKS
capabilities.description: This tool retrieves all bookmarks from the user's Linkhut account. It makes a GET request to the API endpoint and handles authentication. The tool returns a list of bookmarks including details such as URL, title, tags, notes, and timestamp.

capabilities.name: LINKHUT_UPDATE_BOOKMARK
capabilities.description: This tool allows users to update an existing bookmark in LinkHut. The tool updates the metadata of a bookmark including its title, description, and tags.
